title: Margaret Hetherington
deck:
I am married to Alan and we have two sons and three grandchildren. We have lived in Stillington for 42 years and had been part of the village church for many years before becoming part of Gateway.

I have retired from two very different professions: I was a Physiotherapist and subsequently worked as a Relationship Counsellor with Relate. I am involved in various village activities and help at the Foodbank at the Gateway Centre.
